I'm demoing a simple workflow, using our to-do list as an example
```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(googledrive)
library(dplyr)
```

## get file

```{r}
our_file <- drive_get_id("Lucy & Jenny") %>% 
  drive_file
```

## publish file

```{r}
our_file <- our_file %>%
  drive_publish
```

## check publication status

```{r}
our_file$publish
```

## edit file in browser
```{r}
drive_browse(our_file)
```

## pull in file again
```{r}
our_file <- drive_get_id("Lucy & Jenny") %>% 
  drive_file
```

```{r}
our_file
```
